stand in.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to temporarily do someone else’s job or take their place
stand in.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Would you mind standing in for me for a while?
stand in.translation[1].definitions[0].d: someone who does the job or takes the place of someone else for a short time
stand in.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Gilbert failed to find a stand-in and so could not go to the party.
stand in.translation[1].definitions[1].d: someone who takes the place of an actor for some scenes in a film
stand in.translation[2].definitions[0].d: to temporarily do someone else’s job
stand in.translation[2].definitions[0].e: Can you stand in for Meg while she’s on vacation?
